sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
const u1 = 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSYvfDVv21Bf3A2j24tO23YZvmbPG6350dke3RJociX2A&usqp=CAU&ec=48665701'

const indiaStates = [
    { name: 'Andhra Pradesh', id: [1], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'Andhra Pradesh is a state in the south-eastern coastal region of India.' },
    { name: 'Arunachal Pradesh', id: [2], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'Arunachal Pradesh is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Assam', id: [3], urls: { url1: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS74GdQMq6Xv5YsMFeefymDSck-LsRKp6dG5N_XS9Yc9A&s', url2: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS74GdQMq6Xv5YsMFeefymDSck-LsRKp6dG5N_XS9Yc9A&s', url3: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS74GdQMq6Xv5YsMFeefymDSck-LsRKp6dG5N_XS9Yc9A&s' }, textContent: 'Assam is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Bihar', id: [4], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'Bihar is a state in eastern India.' },
    { name: 'Chhattisgarh', id: [5], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'Chhattisgarh is a state in central India.' },
    { name: 'Goa', id: [6], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Goa is a state in western India.' },
    { name: 'Gujarat', id: [7], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Gujarat is a state in western India.' },
    { name: 'Haryana', id: [8], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Haryana is a state in northern India.' },
    { name: 'Himachal Pradesh', id: [9], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Himachal Pradesh is a state in northern India.' },
    { name: 'Jharkhand', id: [10], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Jharkhand is a state in eastern India.' },
    { name: 'Karnataka', id: [11], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Karnataka is a state in southern India.' },
    { name: 'Kerala', id: [12], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Kerala is a state in southern India.' },
    { name: 'Madhya Pradesh', id: [13], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Madhya Pradesh is a state in central India.' },
    { name: 'Maharashtra', id: [14], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Maharashtra is a state in western India.' },
    { name: 'Manipur', id: [15], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Manipur is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Meghalaya', id: [16], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Meghalaya is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Mizoram', id: [17], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Mizoram is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Nagaland', id: [18], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Nagaland is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Odisha', id: [19], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: "Odisha (formerly Orissa) is an eastern Indian state on the Bay of Bengal's coast." },
    { name: 'Punjab', id: [20], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: "Punjab, located in the northwestern part of the Indian subcontinent." },
    { name: 'Rajasthan', id: [21], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Rajasthan is a state in northern India.' },
    { name: 'Sikkim', id: [22], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Sikkim is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Tamil Nadu', id: [23], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Tamil Nadu is a state in southern India.' },
    { name: 'Telangana', id: [24], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Telangana is a state in southern India.' },
    { name: 'Tripura', id: [25], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Tripura is a state in northeastern India.' },
    { name: 'Uttar Pradesh', id: [26], urls: { url1: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,', url2: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTOJ8Ijbbtm3dNI2WEDn57ctN3QLdRzQ3FBp-pOs-CL2w&usqp=CAU&ec=48665701', url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Uttar Pradesh is a state in northern India.' },
    { name: 'Uttarakhand', id: [27], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Uttarakhand is a state in northern India.' },
    { name: 'West Bengal', id: [28], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'West Bengal is a state in eastern India. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful temples, and delicious cuisine.' },
    { name: 'Andaman and Nicobar Islands', id: [29], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'The Andaman and Nicobar Islands are a group of islands at the southeastern edge of the Bay of Bengal.' },
    { name: 'Chandigarh', id: [30], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: 'Chandigarh is a city and union territory in northern India that serves as the capital of the states of Haryana and Punjab.' },
    { name: 'Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu', id: [31], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: "Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu are two separate territories that were merged into one union territory in 2020." },
    { name: 'Lakshadweep', id: [32], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3 }, textContent: "Lakshadweep is a group of islands off the southwestern coast of India." },
    { name: 'Delhi', id: [33], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: "Delhi, officially known as the National Capital Territory of Delhi (NCT), is a city and union territory of India containing New Delhi, the capital of India." },
    { name: 'Puducherry', id: [34], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: "Puducherry (formerly Pondicherry) is a union territory of India located on the southeastern coast." },
    { name: 'Jammu and Kashmir', id: [35], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Jammu and Kashmir is a region administered by India as a union territory.' },
    { name: 'Ladakh', id: [36], urls: { url1: u1, url2: u2, url3: u3, }, textContent: 'Ladakh is a region administered by India as a union territory.' }
];

// id = 34
function StateContent(props) {
    // var id = props.id;
    // console.log(props.id)
    const id = props.id - 1
    const state = indiaStates[id]
    // console.log({ state })

    var urlss = state.urls
    var text = state.textContent
    //   const [, stateData,textContent] = state;
    var textContent = state.name

    const contentStyles = {
        border: "3px solid grey",
        width: "17%",
        display: "inline",
        margin: "20vh 0vw 32vh -15vw",
        height: "43%",
        maxHeight:"43%",
        position: "absolute",
        borderRadius: "10px",
        boxShadow:'1px 1px 1px 1px grey',
       padding:"4px",
       boxSizing:"border-box"
    }
    const imgstyles = {
        margin: '4px 3px auto 2px',
        border: "2px solid grey",
        // margin:'auto',
        // border : 'green',
        position:"relative",
        borderRadius: ' 12px',
        width: '44%',
        height: '45%'
    }
    const img1 = {
        border: "2px solid grey",
        margin: '4px 2px auto 3px',
        borderRadius: ' 15px 15px 15px 15px',
        width: '47%',
        height: '80%',
        flexGrow: "2",
        position:"relative"
    }
    const imgbox = {
        
        display: 'flex',
       padding:"2%",
        width: '100%',
        maxHeight:"60%",
        maxWidth:"100%",
        height: '60%',
        margin:"-6.5px",
        justifyContent:"space-around",
        alignContent: "space-around",
        flexWrap: "wrap",
        cursor:"pointer",
        flexDirection: "column"
    }
  
    const textstyles = {
        fontFamily: 'Mulish',
        fontStyle: 'normal',
        fontWeight: '800',
        fontSize: '20.3104px',
        lineHeight: '25px',
        textTransform: 'uppercase',
        display:"absolute",
        margin:"14px  auto 2px 4px",
        marginLeft:"3px",
        color: '#726E6E',
    }
    const locicon="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/128/10096/10096366.png"
    const iconstyle={
           color:"grey",
           width:"10%",
           height:"7%",
           margin:"8px auto -5px 4px",
           position:"relative"
    }
    const parastyle={
        fontFamily: 'Mulish',
        fontStyle: 'normal',
        fontWeight: '800',
        fontSize: '15.3104px',
        lineHeight: '15px',
        whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
        overflow: 'hidden',
        // textTransform: 'uppercase',
        margin:"0px",
        marginLeft:"4px",
        marginBottom:"1px",
        color: '#726E6E',
    }
    return (
        <div style={contentStyles}>
            <span style={imgbox}>
                <img style={img1} onMouseEnter={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1.05"}} onMouseLeave={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1"}} src={urlss.url1} alt="img!" />
                <img style={imgstyles} onMouseEnter={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1.05"}} onMouseLeave={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1"}} src={urlss.url2} alt="img!" />
                <img style={imgstyles} onMouseEnter={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1.05"}} onMouseLeave={(e)=>{e.target.style.scale = "1"}} src={urlss.url3} alt="img!" />
                {/* <img style={imgstyles} src={urlss.url4} alt="img!" /> */}
                {/* <div styles ={{border:"2px solid red" }}>{images}</div> */}</span>
            <p style={textstyles}><img src = {locicon} style = {iconstyle}></img>{textContent}</p>
            
            {/* <p style= {parastyle}>{text}</p> */}
        </div>
    );
}

export default StateContent;
